ygData.subject: Re: Hotbuttons for expressions like "help!"
ygData.msgSnippet: I have set up hot buttons for lots of different commands, but do not know how to set them up for saying stuff like help! and such.  How does one do this?
ygData.messageBody:
I have set up hot buttons for lots of different commands, but do not know
how to set them up for saying stuff like "help!" and such. How does one do
this? Also, thanks to the tips about the muffins, should save me some
money.

Grod
